metadata.name: Blackjack Dealer
metadata.description:
Time to fuel your gambling addiction with the Blackjack Dealer mod!
This mod adds a blackjack dealer beggar to arcade rooms.
The spawn chance is 50% to replace any machine, beggar or shell game in an arcade room.
To play blackjack - you simply collide with him. That will cost you 5 cents. If you win, you get your coins back.
How to play blackjack? Look it up.
Controls: Shoot left/right - Change the arrow to go hit/stand Bomb - Trigger the action selected by the arrow Drop - Leave the menu
Payouts: 40% - 1 "Special" card which is basically just a playing card. 20% - 2 Random cards 15% - 1 Lucky penny & 2 normal pennies 10% - 2 Keys & 2 bombs 5% - 1 Dime 3% - 1 Random item from the claw machine item pool 3% - 1 Chest 2% - 1 Random Trinket 1% - Destruction of the beggar
Known bugs: Max amount of cards is 7 before they start getting off the paper
Thanks to Discowy 2.0 for the help with sprites and balancing.
